name: _stereos_
description:
Short multidimensional puzzle demo. Switch between top and side views, avoid obstacles and collect all crystals to pass the level. But beware of consequences - trace you leave will become impermeable. Think ahead!

Controls (top view):

  • move with WASD keys
  • move towards edge of map to switch to side view

Controls (side view):

  • move left-right with AD keys
  • jump with W and SPACE keys
  • move down with S key to switch to top view

P.S.: Soundtrack available on Bandcamp
